title: Licensing
content:
Service Management is offered in the license editions of Service Management Express and Service Management Premium. Asset Management is offered as an Asset Management edition. You need a Cloud Management license if you would like to include the Cloud Management capability in Service Management.

  • Service Management Express and Service Management Premium: provide access to IT Service Management and Extended Service Management solutions.
  • Asset Management: provides access to a consolidated Asset Management solution. A Service Management Premium license is required if you would like to include the Asset Management capability in Service Management. Asset Management can also be deployed independently using an Asset Management license if you intend to use Asset Management capabilities only.
  • Cloud Management: provides access to a consolidated Cloud Management solution. A Cloud Management license is required if you would like to include the Cloud Management capability in Service Management. Cloud Management can also be deployed independently if you intend to use Cloud Management capabilities only.

The following tables list the features and products that are available in each license. 

Available features

Module Service Management Express Service Management Premium Asset Management Cloud Management Note
Service Portfolio Management ✓ ✓
Service Catalog Management ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ With a Cloud Management license, this module is limited to cloud management use cases.
 
Time Period Management ✓ ✓
Service Level Management ✓ ✓
Company Management (Basic) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Provides the Companies and Brands tabs.
Company Management (CSM-extended) ✓ Provides the Companies, Brands, Product Models, Product Instances, Product Versions, Product Modules, Environments, Licenses, and Entitlements tabs.
Change Management ✓ ✓
Release Management ✓ ✓
Knowledge Management ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Service Asset and Configuration Management ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

The Finance tab on Device/Infrastructure & Peripheral /Subscription records is available for the Service Management Premium and Asset Management licenses only.

The Enterprise Asset Management is available for the Service Management Premium or Asset Management license only.

With a Cloud Management license, this module is limited to cloud management use cases.

For Native SACM impact analysis, a model is required in UCMDB. Models can be manually created, or imported, or discovered using Premium discovery licenses.
Survey Management ✓ ✓
Service Design ✓ Supports AWS, Microsoft Azure, and GCP.
Service Request Management ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ With a Cloud Management license, this module is limited to cloud management use cases.
Incident Management ✓ ✓
Problem Management ✓ ✓
On-Call Schedule Management ✓ ✓
Deployment Operations ✓
Automated Operations ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

2 concurrent OO workflows are included in the Service Management and Asset Management product licenses, additional concurrent OO workflows can be purchased as add-on license capacity.

5 concurrent OO workflows are included in the Cloud Management product license for cloud management use cases only. 
Contract Management ✓ ✓
Idea and Proposal Management ✓ ✓
Application Portfolio Management ✓ ✓
Project and Program Management ✓ ✓
Software Asset Management ✓

The new Software Asset Management (SAM) capability requires a SAM unit license.

50 SAM units are included in the Asset Management license. Additional SAM units can be purchased as add-on license capacity. 
Financial Management ✓ ✓ ✓ With a Cloud Management license, this module is limited to cloud management use cases.
Procurement Management ✓ ✓
OPTIC Data Lake Integration ✓ ✓

Available products

Product Service Management Suite Express Service Management Suite Premium Asset Management Cloud Management Note
UCMDB ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 50 Universal Discovery units are included in the Service Management and Asset Management licenses. 
Universal Discovery (UD) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

50 UD units are included in the Service Management and Asset Management licenses. Additional UD units can be purchased as add-on license capacity. 

The Cloud Management license doesn't have the 50 UD units included, and UD units can be purchased separately.
Operations Orchestration (OO) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

2 concurrent OO workflows are included in the Service Management and Asset Management licenses. Additional concurrent OO workflows can be purchased as add-on license capacity.

5 concurrent OO workflows are included in the Cloud Management license for cloud management use cases only. 
Connect-It (CIT) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
